ch0653_68_kirika/0101_0701_02_10: I’d like to design a furisode based on your look.
ch0653_68_kirika/7101_0701_01_10:
Oh. My. Gosh. Valerie gave me a
compliment recently!
ch0653_68_kirika/7101_0701_02_10:
She said some very kind words about my design
for an outfit!
ch0653_68_kirika/7101_0701_03_10:
Valerie is such a wonderful person! Her charm is
guaranteed to get you obsessed with her!
ch0653_68_kirika/7105_0701_01_10: Ahh, Valerie... So beautiful, even in pictures...
ch0653_68_kirika/7105_0701_03_10:
P-please don’t tell anyone I’m carrying around a
picture of Valerie!
ch0653_68_kirika/1701_0701_01_10: Please take this. It’s just a little something.
ch0653_68_kirika/1701_0702_01_10:
No need to thank me. I just want to share
beautiful things with everyone.
ch0653_68_kirika/2501_0701_01_10:
To be honest, I’ve lost a bit of confidence since I
came to Pasio.
ch0653_68_kirika/2501_0701_02_10:
There’s so many fashionable people, like Elesa
and Nessa...
ch0653_68_kirika/2501_0701_03_10:
But I want to be close to Valerie... So I have to
work even harder!
ch0653_68_kirika/2501_0702_01_10:
Valerie always says to pursue your own beauty,
even if you start with other people as a
reference, but...
ch0653_68_kirika/2501_0702_02_10:
I can’t help but wonder what everyone else is
doing! Does that mean I’m immature?
ch0653_68_kirika/3001_0701_01_10:
No matter how sleepy I am in the morning,
I’m wide awake as soon as I put my furisode on!
ch0653_68_kirika/3003_0701_01_10:
Today—as always—I’m going to battle with style!
I’ve got a reputation to uphold!
ch0653_68_kirika/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! Wow...the stylish night views on
Pasio fill me with so much inspiration!
